Questions.Question: What is the largest online learning platform?
Questions.Explanation: Coursera is the largest online learning platform, offering courses from top universities and institutions worldwide.

Questions.Question: Which platform offers free online courses?
Questions.Explanation: Khan Academy is a non-profit organization that provides free online courses in various subjects.

Questions.Question: What is the main advantage of online education?
Questions.Explanation: Online education offers flexibility, allowing learners to study at their own pace and schedule.

Questions.Question: Which platform offers professional courses and certifications?
Questions.Explanation: LinkedIn Learning offers professional courses and certifications to enhance career skills and knowledge.

Questions.Question: What is the term for online courses with no set schedule?
Questions.Explanation: Self-paced online courses allow learners to study at their own pace without a set schedule.

Questions.Question: Which platform offers coding and programming courses?
Questions.Explanation: Codecademy is an online platform that offers coding and programming courses for beginners and advanced learners.

Questions.Question: What is the term for online courses with real-time interaction?
Questions.Explanation: Synchronous online courses involve real-time interaction between instructors and learners, such as live video lectures.

Questions.Question: Which platform offers language learning courses?
Questions.Explanation: Duolingo is a popular platform for learning languages through interactive exercises and gamification.

Questions.Question: What is the term for online courses with pre-recorded lectures?
Questions.Explanation: Asynchronous online courses involve pre-recorded lectures and materials that learners can access at any time.

Questions.Question: Which platform offers creative and artistic courses?
Questions.Explanation: Skillshare is an online platform that offers creative and artistic courses taught by industry professionals.

Questions.Question: What is the term for online courses with live video lectures?
Questions.Explanation: Live online courses involve real-time video lectures and interactive sessions with instructors and fellow learners.

Questions.Question: Which platform offers university-level courses?
Questions.Explanation: edX is an online learning platform that offers university-level courses from renowned institutions.

Questions.Question: What is the term for online courses with set schedules?
Questions.Explanation: Synchronous online courses have set schedules where learners need to attend live sessions at specific times.

Questions.Question: Which platform offers courses taught by industry experts?
Questions.Explanation: MasterClass offers online courses taught by industry experts in various fields, including arts, sports, and business.

Questions.Question: What is the term for online courses with interactive elements?
Questions.Explanation: Interactive online courses involve engaging activities and exercises that promote active learning and participation.

Questions.Question: Which platform offers courses in business and entrepreneurship?
Questions.Explanation: Udacity offers courses in business and entrepreneurship, focusing on practical skills and real-world applications.

Questions.Question: What is the term for online courses with no instructor-led sessions?
Questions.Explanation: Self-paced online courses do not have instructor-led sessions, allowing learners to study independently.

Questions.Question: Which platform offers courses in data science and analytics?
Questions.Explanation: Coursera offers courses in data science and analytics, providing learners with valuable skills in this field.

Questions.Question: What is the term for online courses with real-time communication?
Questions.Explanation: Synchronous online courses involve real-time communication between instructors and learners, such as live chat or video conferencing.

Questions.Question: Which platform offers courses in photography and visual arts?
Questions.Explanation: Udemy offers courses in photography and visual arts, catering to both beginners and experienced individuals.

Questions.Question: What is the term for online courses with no fixed start or end date?
Questions.Explanation: Self-paced online courses have no fixed start or end date, allowing learners to begin and complete them at their convenience.
